title: In a Tizzy
description:
Julia Wiedeman, David Montgomery and Jessica Wise share stories of hilarious and harrowing crises.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kevin Allison, Julia Wiedeman, Albino, Jessica Wise, Paolo Nutini, The Castle Walls, David Montgomery)
